name: jumpy fox (Wolves are Essential)
description:
Supposed to be a platform-Rhythm game,  and I realized how terrible I am xD

The game also glitches, but I thought it's my first game in gamejam so I decided to upload it anyway ;)

The main character foxy will automatically run at a certain speed, your task will be try collecting stars and avoid boxes throughout the game.  

Press ESC to toggle between menu and game, the tutorial menu will show up when first start the game

Press C to jump, you can do a double jump

Press X to attack the boxes in front of you

Collect stars will grant you a certain amount of joy, Press Z to do a special attack, which will consume joy and makes you invulnerable to boxes

The tempo for typing the action suppose to match the rhythm of the music but I screwed that up so bear with that xD
